programme.title: Expedition Killer Whale 1
programme.desc: In Antarctica, the most sophisticated hunting behaviour in the animal kingdom takes place - killer whales creating waves to wash seals off pieces of floating ice. A team of scientists and filmmakers travel to these freezing waters to find out more about these unique animals and how they do it. And one of the scientists is looking for one killer whale in particular. But their mission is not just to deepen our understanding of this extraordinary hunting behaviour. The team are also intent on learning more about the secret - and more tender side - of the lives of these killer whales.

programme.title: Hidden Frontiers: Arabia with Reza Pakravan 1
programme.desc: Reza investigates the evidence of Persian leopards' existence in the mountains of Iraqi Kurdistan.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano 1
programme.desc: Volcano expert Chris Horsley returns to the Spanish Canary Island La Palma. The Cumbre Vieja eruption's destructive lava flow has ruined thousands of homes and lives.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? 1
programme.desc: Discover how engineers bent two Manhattan skyscrapers and then connected them with a sky bridge 700 feet in the air, and in Greece the 10,000 square foot canopy designed to withstand hurricane winds on a building engineered to survive earthquakes.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat doesn't realise today's Special Delivery, a super all-in-one remote control, is quite as powerful as it is! programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Someone is giving presents to everyone in Toyland and all the toys want to say thank you but no one knows the identity of the secret gift giver! It's up to Noddy to investigate and find out who is it that's leaving presents for all the friends. By following clues and using his investigation skills, Noddy follows the trail to Animal Acres and discovers that Pat Pat and the Pockets are the secret gift-givers. programme.title: Aging In The Wild

programme.title: Barmageddon S1

programme.title: So Help Me Todd S1

programme.title: Entertainment Tonight

programme.title: Murder For Hire S1

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Squad 2
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean military survival show brings eight Special Force units together to compete in extreme missions that will test their physical stamina, mental strength and teamwork. Top male reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle till the end in front of five celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join award-winning Malaysian actress Siti Saleha and her husband as they explore the city by day and venture into the night, discovering its vibrant culture and hidden treasures.

programme.title: Punish Evil
programme.desc: A shipment of newly issued currency is robbed by three armed robbers, prompting Detective Chang to launch an investigation. Following new leads, he successfully takes down one of the robbers. Meanwhile, the other two plot to rob a gold factory amidst the chaos. With meticulous planning, Chang thwarts their scheme and brings them to justice.

programme.title: Elimination Game
programme.desc: Navy SEAL Rick is sentenced to rot in a military prison until he is offered the opportunity to put his life on the line and win his freedom in a kill or be killed reality show. Rick will have to eliminate some of the world's most notorious killers on live TV to gain his freedom and clear his name. Can he succeed finally?

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 5 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagbibigay ng mga mahalagang pangyayari, paksa, at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggan o nabasang teksto. Matutuhan din dito ang wastong pagbaybay sa mga salita at paglalarawan ng tagpuan at tauhan.

programme.title: Grade 5 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about area, volume, and temperature. These episodes also explain line graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 5 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on analyzing visual and multimedia elements and writing paragraphs and articles.

programme.title: Grade 5 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay pag-uusapan ang bahaging ginampanan ng kolonyalismong Espanyol at pandaigdigang koteksto ng reporma sa pag- usbong ng kamalayang pambansa patungo sa pagkabuo ng Pilipinas bilang isang nasyon.

programme.title: Grade 5 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain how weathering and soil erosion shape the Earth’s surface and affect living things and the environment. These episodes also discuss about weather disturbances and their effects, the phases of the Moon and the beliefs and practices, associated with it, and the constellations and the information derived from their location in the sky.

programme.title: Grade 7 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang mga akda ayon sa mga tauhan, kaisipan, at saloobin na nakapaloob dito. Tatalakayin din ang pagsusulat ng sariling pananaw at ideya tungkol sa napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 7 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach the key concepts, uses, and importance of statistics, data collection/gathering and the different forms of data representation, measures of central tendency, measures of variability, and probability.

programme.title: Grade 7 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach writing and composing essays. These also feature Philippine literature and theater.

programme.title: Grade 7 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagtugon ng mga Asyano sa mga hamon ng pagbabago, pag-unlad at pagpapatuloy ng Silangan at Timog-Silangang Asya sa Transisyonal at Makabagong Panahon (ika-16 hanggang ika-20 Siglo).

programme.title: Grade 7 Science
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the relation of geographical location of the Philippines to its environment, the different phenomena that occur in the atmosphere, the relationship of the seasons and the position of the Sun in the sky, and the occurrence of eclipses.

programme.title: Grade 9 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng iba't ibang akda na may kaugnayan sa kulturang Asyano batay sa mga elemento nito. Ipapaliwanag din dito kung paano maglahad at maghambing ng mga pananaw.

programme.title: Grade 9 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the basic concepts of trigonometry.

programme.title: Grade 9 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the relevance worth of ideas, soundness of author’s reasoning, and the effectiveness of a presentation. These also explain critical issues that demand sound analysis and call for prompt actions.

programme.title: Grade 9 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa mga sektor ng ekonomiya at mga patakarang pang- ekonomiya nito sa harap ng mga hamon at pwersa tungo sa pambansang pagsulong at pag-unlad.

programme.title: Grade 9 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the projectile motion, impulse and momentum, and conservation of linear momentum, conservation of mechanical energy, the relationship among heat, work, and efficiency. These episodes also talk about generation, transmission, and distribution of electrical energy from power plants to home.

programme.title: Extracurricular
programme.desc: These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.

programme.title: Parent-Teacher Activity Time
programme.desc: These episodes are intented to help parents and teachers in teaching and guiding their children and students. These explain different topics that will help them be prepared for the distance learning set up.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of planning, setting up, and running a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: The contenders compete to win immunity from the upcoming elimination, with the Round 1 victor cooking against a pro for the prize of an immunity pin. First off, a coffee-themed challenge.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: An elimination challenge sees the final eight find what appears to be a science lab set up behind the judges, and learn that today’s first challenge is a taste test - with a twist.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Today’s Mystery Box is the MasterChef classic – the Everything Box, where the contestants must cook a dish using all the ingredients in some way or other.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: This time round it's a Pressure Test, set by top chef Clare Smyth. The judges reveal that today will be a marathon, not a sprint, with the three cooks given five hours to compete the dish.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Today, in teams of two, the Top 6 contestants are out on the farm, and must forage from the plentiful produce to pick an ingredient to feature in a course for restaurant diners. But there's also a catch...

programme.title: Temptation Under The Sun
programme.desc: While vacationing on an exotic island Detective Cassady Cruz begins a torrid affair with charming expat Travis King, but when his ex-girlfriend, Minnie, winds up dead he is accused of her murder.

programme.title: The Art Of Passion
programme.desc: Hope Williams, a successful doctor, meets an accomplished artist on a girls' night out. He is everything her past lovers were not, and she discovers a side of her that she never knew existed.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: Dolmar gets a great deal on a zombie in the up-and-coming Spring Hill neighbourhood, but after a series of mistakes and expensive renovations this money maker quickly starts to look more like a money pit!

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: A wholesale deal in Pinellas Park looks like a three bed house with potential, but when they get there it seems to be more trouble than it's worth. The third bedroom is a garage with an electric panel.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: With Gordon Ramsay’s reputation on the line, the top six chefs face the ultimate challenge of taking over the world's largest Hell's Kitchen restaurant.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The remaining five home cooks take on two rounds of challenges that determine who will move on to the Finals.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The final three home cooks take on their last challenge in the MasterChef kitchen in front of a live audience. Each chef has to whip up a spectacular three-course meal.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: Judges Gordon Ramsay, Aarón Sánchez and Joe Bastianich crown the next MasterChef champion and the winner of $250,000.

programme.title: A Dangerous Affair
programme.desc: Pilates instructor Amelie begins a steamy affair with one of her clients, handsome journalist Pierce Dalton, only to find herself embroiled in a deadly love triangle.

programme.title: Greed: A Seven Deadly Sins Story
programme.desc: Interior decorator Zuri Maxwell has a dream career, a loving family and a good man, but greed threatens to destroy everything when she meets a handsome benefactor and his fabulously wealthy aunt.

programme.title: Buried In Barstow
programme.desc: Angie Harmon stars as Hazel King, a single mother determined to shield her daughter from the life she once had while protecting and defending those who can't protect themselves.

programme.title: A Dangerous Affair
programme.desc: Pilates instructor Amelie begins a steamy affair with one of her clients, handsome journalist Pierce Dalton, only to find herself embroiled in a deadly love triangle.

programme.title: The Art Of Passion
programme.desc: Hope Williams, a successful doctor, meets an accomplished artist on a girls' night out. He is everything her past lovers were not, and she discovers a side of her that she never knew existed.

programme.title: Move Or Improve (S1)
programme.desc: Sid and Sneha love the area where they bought their first townhome together. After six years living there and both working from home now, their small first home no longer fits their growing needs.

programme.title: Move Or Improve (S1)
programme.desc: After 23 years in their small town, Kathe and Joal have run oiut of space. Kathe's dedication to her crafts and hobbies and Joal's new interest in cooking all need extra room.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: With Gordon Ramsay’s reputation on the line, the top six chefs face the ultimate challenge of taking over the world's largest Hell's Kitchen restaurant.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Education Chance Opens the World
programme.desc: Maxine is a university student. She joined a school providing educational support and life advice to international students wanting to enter Japanese high school. This experience changed her life

programme.title: JAPAN'S TOP INVENTIONS
programme.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: Capsule Figures.

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Found all over Japan, torii are gateways to Shinto shrines and the deities within. We meet people trying to rebuild torii after a huge earthquake and examine what torii mean to Japanese people.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The Unbreakable Silence
programme.desc: In July 2024, the Supreme Court ruled Japan's defunct Eugenic Protection Law as unconstitutional. We look into why many of the victims who were forcefully sterilized remain silent on their suffering.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Piano Girl
programme.desc: Okinawa, Japan. Momoko loved the piano and attended a school that had one. Then the war arrived and she was drafted to work in an army hospital. Could she survive the war through the power of music?

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN
programme.desc: Historically the gateway to Asia, Fukuoka is where Japan's rice-growing culture began. We'll meet organic farmers, canal boatmen, traditional fireworks makers, and the last of the area's coal miners.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: DESIGN X STORIES
programme.desc: Today's theme: Design Hunting in Kamakura. The seat of Japan's shogunate 800 years ago, Kamakura has many shrines and temples and is a popular tourist spot. Join us on a hunt for regional designs.

programme.title: u&i
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: Texico
programme.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: SAMURAI CASTLES Himeji The Keep
programme.desc: Himeji Castle, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, boasts the tallest, extant main keep in Japan. The elegant main keep and the sub-keeps are connected by corridors, forming a sturdy defense.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: The head Inari shrine has 30,000 subordinate shrines throughout Japan. Since its foundation in 711, the Inari deities attract worshippers with varying needs.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: NHK WORLD SELECTION

programme.desc: When disaster strikes, it can be hard to find people trapped under rubble, while fire, volcanic eruption, or nuclear accidents may bar entry entirely. That's where disaster response robots can help.

programme.desc: Akita / Koike Kazuko (creative director) Nishimonai Bon Odori Festival has continued for over 700 years. Koike finds timeless beauty in the costumes, remade using beloved family kimono.

programme.title: u&i

programme.title: Texico
programme.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN
programme.desc: Historically the gateway to Asia, Fukuoka is where Japan's rice-growing culture began. We'll meet organic farmers, canal boatmen, traditional fireworks makers, and the last of the area's coal miners.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: NHK WORLD SELECTION

programme.title: BOSAI:Disaster Response Robots
programme.desc: When disaster strikes, it can be hard to find people trapped under rubble, while fire, volcanic eruption, or nuclear accidents may bar entry entirely. That's where disaster response robots can help.

programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. // Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: The Great Shark Hunter

programme.title: Sharks, Sharks, Sharks

programme.title: Swim Break
programme.desc: The Sharks travel to a tropical resort where Baby makes a plan to have the perfect vacation.

programme.desc: Rubble dreams that he's been taken aboard a spaceship and meets his alien double. When the ship crashes on an alien planet, he needs help.

programme.desc: When Speed Meister's rollercoaster sends a pet playdate out of control, Rubble & Crew save the day with a bigger, better, and safer coaster. // The Bark Yard safety inspection is today! But will Motor go boom and cost the Crew a gold safety star?

programme.title: Pretend Friend
programme.desc: Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called “Leo Lion”. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along. But George feels a bit left out.

programme.title: The Time Capsule
programme.desc: Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Recycling
programme.desc: Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Daddy Pig's Office
programme.desc: Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig’s office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit’s job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat‘s job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig’s job is complicated.

programme.title: The Gift Box
programme.desc: The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Strawberries
programme.desc: Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: Dino Cake / Dumplings
programme.desc: Olly wants to make a simple cake for her Dinosaur Club, but Chef insists on complicating the recipe. // Chef and Olly are making dumplings, but when first-timer Olly is better at making them, Chef must regain his confidence in his folding skills.

programme.title: Snap Pea Stir-Fry
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: The Mystery Bandit
programme.desc: When a mysterious bandit makes off with Blaze’s metallic trophy, he must track down the culprit in this preschool whodunit!

programme.title: The Tiger Treasure

programme.title: The Fishers Go Fishing

programme.title: Hide-and-Go-Shark

programme.title: Dr. X On The Air
programme.desc: Joe de Lirio (Leo Martinez) is a sexiologist, but he is better known as a radio personality. In his raunchy but highly rated radio program, "Dr. X" he gives out advice to sexually troubled women. But just as Joe is gaining a loyal following among wives, he too is earning the ire of husbands.

programme.title: It's Cool Bulol
programme.desc: Red Sternberg stars as a campus nerd who has always been wanting to be accepted for what he is. He's smart, alright, but in an environment where substance takes a backseat to style, he is everybody's favorite laughingstock.

programme.title: Pangako... Ikaw Lang
programme.desc: Vince (Aga Muhlach) is comatose and mistakes Cristina (Regine Velasquez) as his guardian angel when he sees her as he opened his eyes. He finds her to get to know her better.

programme.title: Pedro Penduko Episode 2 (The Return of the Comeback)
programme.desc: He is descendant of a Legendary hero, but for the young Pedro Penduko (Janno Gibbs) heroism in the silver screen is more appealing than real life bravado. But Pedro is not destined to be a movie star, he finds himself in the center of a kingdom in need of a hero.

programme.title: Edward
programme.desc: Edward, Thop Nazareno's sophomore coming of age feature, is a testament to a teenager finding self-actualization in the reality of a Philippine public hospital setting.

programme.title: Dito Sa Puso Ko
programme.desc: Ligaya Tatlonghari (Judy Ann Santos) is a movie fan in every sense of the word--she eats and breathes showbiz. She has two foremost dreams: to travel to the United States, and to join her favorite TV game show.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Wish You Were The One
programme.desc: A woman trying to crash a wedding, in hopes of winning her ex back, finds luck when she meets a man going to the same wedding. They then pretend to be engaged.

programme.title: Sid & Aya (Not A Love Story)
programme.desc: It follows Sid (Dingdong Dantes) who suffers from insomnia and meets Aya (Anne Curtis) who he hires to accompany him in his sleepless nights.

programme.title: My Bakit List
programme.desc: Bombarded with so much why's in her life, Dess (Louise delos Reyes) embarks on a soul searching journey. Unknown to her, she is about to face the biggest why of her life when she accidentally bumps into her ex-boyfriend who left her without any explanation.

programme.title: First Time
programme.desc: Watch as three young temptresses seduce their way to your home and tell you their hot first time experiences.

programme.title: Co-Ed Scandal
programme.desc: The Co-Ed Scandal: two girls and a boy of barely legal age are caught having sex on tape. The film draws answers from the urban legends that grew around the controversial sex videos and the result is a humorous narrative with elements of mock documentary.

programme.title: Full Moon
programme.desc: A young girl (Barbie Forteza) has her first brush with romance. Unluckily for her, her paramour (Derrick Monasterio) bears a dark, monstrous secret that will soon prove to be a challenge for their young love.

programme.title: Pandanggo sa Hukay
programme.desc: A small-town midwifes preparation for a job interview is disrupted by series of unfortunate turn of events.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Nicholas works as a dentist in Canada. However, he faces difficulties when a new neighbour moves in and he learns that he is Jimmy Tudeski, a contract killer, who is also known as Jimmy The Tulip.

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, who had left his Jaeger training midway, gets a chance to live up to his father's legacy as he teams up with his estranged sister and former co-pilot to stop a new Kaiju threat.

programme.title: Dead Man Down
programme.desc: A man left for dead goes after the Eastern European mob boss who killed his wife and daughter by infiltrating his gang and killing them off one by one, while sending clues to let him know he is coming.

programme.title: Curvature
programme.desc: A scientist must break into a top-secret facility in order to travel back in time and prevent a murder after receiving a mysterious phone call from herself.

programme.title: City Of Ember
programme.desc: Ember was built as a refuge for humanity 200 years ago. Now, the great generator that powers the city is failing, and Ember is falling into darkness as the dazzling lights begin to flicker and fade.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: After learning about his dying father, Mr Miyagi sets off to see him with Daniel. Upon reaching there, he decides to confront an old rival; meanwhile, Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: Maersk Alabama, an unarmed US container ship, gets hijacked by Somali pirates, led by Abduwali Muse, en route to Kenya. The ship's captain and Muse soon are at the mercy of uncontrollable forces.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Miami detectives Marcus Burnett and Mike Lowrey are back in a war on the drug Ecstasy on the streets in Miami.

programme.title: Dead Man Down

programme.title: Cry No Fear
programme.desc: Two half-sisters are always at each other's throats. However, when they are left alone in their house during a raging storm and encounter ruthless intruders who try to kill them, they have no choice but to team up in order to escape.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.title: Bunshinsaba: Hoichi the Earless
programme.desc: You Mei brings home an abandoned doll found on the street. Little does she know that it is possessed by an evil spirit which causes the sudden death of her colleague. You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Isolation
programme.desc: The story is inspired by a true event. Creighton whisks his wife away for a vacation on a remote island in the Bahamas to save their marriage, but finds themselves hunted down by modern day pirates instead. With no one to trust but each other, the couple is forced to work together and fight for their lives.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: À La Recherche Du Légume Star
programme.desc: All the world's vegetables have come together with just one idea in mind: to find themselves on every plate and make every child love them. For that, they each pass before the judges and offer the very best of themselves, in the hope of being awarded the highest marks.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Âges
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Kenda
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: La Rivière À L'Envers
programme.desc: The children arrive before the Great Mist, the final obstacle protecting the Qjar River from intruders. Entering it means being lost forever in a fog so thick that it swallows all who venture there. But Tomek and Hannah have no intention of giving up so close to their goal.

programme.title: Pfffirates
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: Mission Info + Jt Ado
programme.desc: Mission Info + Jt Ado

programme.title: 7 Jours
programme.desc: ''7 jours'', a weekly magazine programme covering news on society and international events to know all there is to know... in French

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'Hebdo

''Objectif Monde L'Hebdo'', a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Télévisions).

programme.title: Quartier Recherché
programme.desc: In Quebec, Corey and Evelyne accompany a mother of three, all teenagers, who's looking for a house where everyone can have their own bedroom in a district that offers a wide range of activities. So which will she prefer: Beauport of Saint-Émile?

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Côte d'azur.

programme.title: Bien Bâti
programme.desc: The Monastery of the Augustinian Sisters has been redesigned as a hotel complex focusing on harmony between the old and the new. At the Verdun Auditorium, the new arena perfectly sits side by side with the 1938 Art Deco wing and the beautiful EcoRad radiators.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Born in Mali, adopted by a French family, since her childhood Sophie was subjected to racist remarks which hurt her but made her stronger. She has a passion for beauty and she learns Japanese techniques and creates a unique facial protocol, which leads her to encounter some stars.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: He is a super featherweight boxer who won the WBC silver belt at the end of 2024, also European champion: Khalil El Hadri is our guest.

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planète B
programme.desc: Blocking roads, action in museums, intrusions at events, and sabotage... Green activism has taken on new, more shocking and radical forms. Why is civil disobedience growing? With Cyril Dion, an activist, writer and director of the film ''Demain''.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.desc: Magazine

programme.desc: In town or in the countryside, day or night, Jérôme Colin, the presenter-taxi driver leads his prestigious customer on a four-wheel journey conducive to secrets.

programme.title: Sur Le Front
programme.desc: Rainbow trout, blue crab, European mink, Asian hornets, Florida turtles, ring-necked parakeets... These exotic animals are now proliferating in France, often to the expense of native species. Who imported them? Hugo Clément goes in search of those responsible and meets those fighting to ban their sale.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: Pau, today home to a museum dedicated to Henri IV. Designer and interior designer, Chloé Nègre creates colourful spaces bringing the beauty of handiwork and craftsmanship to life. Celebrating his brand's 10th anniversary, Charles Jeffrey presents a runway show centred on utility. Denis Tomasina restores old clocks.

programme.title: Meurtres Sur Les Îles Du Frioul
programme.desc: In the midst of a theatre performance of the ''Count of Monte Cristo'', a Marseille publisher is found dead on the Frioul Islands. Victor Mariani, detective inspector in Marseille, leads the investigation, and also tries to solve another riddle: the presence of his father, Pierre Mariani, in the audience.

programme.title: Honest Candidate 2
programme.desc: Joo Sang-sook, who failed to win the Seoul mayoral election by dropping the truth bomb on national television, is suddenly pulled into the spotlight again after rescuing a young man from drowning.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: Mr. Queen Ep1
programme.desc: After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.

programme.title: Mr. Queen Ep2
programme.desc: After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.

programme.title: Joseon Chefs
programme.desc: A nobleman who has passed the national civil service exam, meets the self-proclaimed best chef in Joseon, falls into the world of gourmet food and sets out to find the life he truly wants.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Waiting For Rain
programme.desc: An unmotivated student regains his passion for life after exchanging letters with his childhood friend and promise to meet if it rains on December 31st each year.

programme.title: Crazy Romance
programme.desc: Two co-workers navigate their feelings for each other through a minefield of office gossip and social media.

programme.title: The Face Reader
programme.desc: Nae-gyeong is the most skillful face reader in all of Joeson dynasty. After his abilities are acknowledged, he gets pulled into a royal power struggle involving the King's successor.

programme.title: Smugglers
programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...

programme.title: Chef and My Fridge (2024)
programme.desc: The best chefs from <Culinary Class Wars> go head-to-head to create impromptu dishes that feature ingredients found inside the guest stars' very own refrigerators.

programme.title: Antipolo Massacre
programme.desc: Based on a true to life story of Cecilia Masagca Antipolo Massacre is one of the most vindictive and brutal films of 1994. Possessed by an evil spirit lurked into his soul, Winifredo (Cesar Montano) brought misery and affliction to his once happy and contented family life.

programme.title: Kahit Sa Bala Kakapit Ako
programme.desc: Friendship comes to a test in this tale about the mild-mannered Efren and Nestor, the member of an underground rebel group. Efren became unwittingly involved with Nestor's activities when he was put under suspicion.

programme.title: Estudyante Blues
programme.desc: The hit song by well-known folk singer, Freddie Aguilar, "Anak", was the basis for this light-hearted tale about campus life. Escapades of eight young men who were classmates in school but who also had to deal with their personal problems.

programme.title: Swindler's List
programme.desc: Leo and Niño were the swindlers in this wacky tale. But only because of a very good reason: to provide a home for the orphanage. The duo decided to raise money by swindling the rich to give to the poor.

programme.title: Huwag Mong Itanong Kung Bakit
programme.desc: Aning (Cherie Gil) is a maid in the Cuevas household. She is raped by an unknown assailant and comes home to the province pregnant. Her older sister Dinya (Dina Bonnevie) serves the Cuevas household to search for the culprit.

programme.title: Lumaban Ka… Sagot Kita
programme.desc: Linette (Cherie Pie Picache) is an active student leader. She is frustrated that her boyfriend Dado (Julio Diaz) is apathetic towards the situation. But this will soon change.

programme.title: Pasan Ko Ang Daigdig (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Sharon played a scavenger among the garbage who had to carry her crippled mother on her back while begging on the steps of the Manila Cathedral. Raped by an unknown man, she left her poverty laden existence and won success as a singer.

programme.title: Bangers
programme.desc: Lolo Hop and his grandsons, Hip and Hap, went to the big city to investigate the mysterious death of their brother, Hep. Lolo Hop, Hip and Hap had no idea of what they were getting into but the result was incredibly hilarious.

programme.title: Nognog
programme.desc: Nognog

programme.title: Blondie
programme.desc: Lorna (Ilonah Jean) and her friends are gripped in fear as a serial killer is on the loose. But a pattern soon emerges. The victims are all men and a girl in blood wig is seen fleeing the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Pilya
programme.desc: Ditas has the body of a full-grown adult but her sense is that of a child. Although she exists in an environment where vulgarity is deemed normal, she maintains her wide-eyed innocence.

programme.title: Bitag (Babae at Bala)
programme.desc: Sgt. Nick Nobleza (Jestoni Alarcon) is the straightest cop in the police force. He is assigned to infiltrate the drug syndicate of Mr. Villafuerte. But Mr. Villafuerte is one step ahead as he sets up a trap of his own.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 6
programme.desc: Watch your back! TruTV is counting down the 20 dumbest pranksters on the planet! They're gluing phones to faces, faking pregnancies, and pranking the ultimate April Fool! Totally in on the joke is our hilarious cast of comedians, including Chris Fairbanks, Gilbert Gottfried, Kevin McCaffrey, and Judy Gold.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 7
programme.desc: Not to brag, but we've got 20 of the World's Dumbest Show Offs and they're about to take center stage. From a bikini babe crushing melons with her thighs, to a spectacular car crash and a dance routine that leaves nothing to the imagination... they all crave attention, and they get plenty from our cast of hilarious comedians, including Mike Britt, Rachel Feinstein, and Gilbert Gottfried.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 8
programme.desc: Don't touch that remote, it's time for 20 of the World's Dumbest TV Shows... from Brazilian cross dressers and out-of-control bounty hunters, to a reverend who curses up a storm, insane mixed martial arts, and the cheesiest superhero ever to pretendto fly. With hilarious commentary from comedians like Jared Logan, Judy Gold, and Chris Fairbanks.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 15
programme.desc: The bidders go head to head on a bin full of motorcycle parts, while a unit with a body bag and hooks hanging from the ceiling has everyone dying to know what's inside!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 16
programme.desc: An item in one bin has Papa Bear and Mone revving their engines, while T Money gambles on guns being hidden in another bin. Team Brandori bids up the auctions, infuriating the others to the point of retaliation. But who will get the last laugh?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 17
programme.desc: A bin from "down under" holds a dark and mysterious surprise. Jessie vows to keep everyone from making any profit. Papa Bear pushes Brandon to the brink, and T Money gets a taste of the geriatric life.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 18
programme.desc: On the hottest day of the year, will the sun cause the bidders to make crazy decisions? In the sweltering heat, the bidders must fight for the ultimate blind buy - a unit completely hidden behind a sheet of plastic!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 19
programme.desc: Brandon arrives solo to the auction, but still flexes his muscle. The men gamble on an abandoned recording studio. And a trailer with Civil War items incites the men to wage a bidding war.

programme.title: Hack My Life Inside Hacks S1 14
programme.desc: Which outdoor chore helped Brooke keep the rage at bay? What were the first tennis balls made out of? And which host was a high school track star? We're packing all that and much more into this edition of Inside Hacks.

programme.title: Sphere
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman, Sharon Stone and Samuel L. Jackson star as a group of scientists recruited by the Navy to conduct a secret underwater mission to explore an alien spaceship.

programme.title: Dirty Money S1 10
programme.desc: An auto junkyard inspires the guys to turn some rusted American classics into crisp American dollars.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 5
programme.desc: Sheldon and Leonard get invited to a housewarming party at WIL WHEATON's house; while Howard gets an out-of-this-world opportunity!

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 6
programme.desc: A cute comic book artist (guest star COURTNEY FORD) puts Leonard's relationship with Priya to the test; while Sheldon, getting into the spirit of Halloween, tries to scare the guys.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 7
programme.desc: Craving a little motherly love, Sheldon competes with the gang for his mother's attention when she comes to visit. LAURIE METCALF reprises her role as Sheldon's mother, Mary.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 8
programme.desc: Amy is heartbroken when Bernadette and Penny go shopping for wedding dresses without her.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 9
programme.desc: Can friends with benefits still be friends without? Leonard and Penny try hanging out alone, while Sheldon must overcome his fear of birds.

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 16
programme.desc: The sequel to Young Sheldon follows Georgie and Mandy as they raise their young family in Texas.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S1 5
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys demonstrate their odd living habits while interviewing for roommates, cut the line for Broadway tickets in Times Square, and push each other to the limit ina pet store

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S1 6
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys massage beachgoers on the boardwalk, broadcast the news from Times Square, and get their kicks teaching a karate class.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S1 7
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys swipe food off other diners' plates at a buffet, tutor students in foreign languages they don't speak, and try to start a dance party in a public park.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S1 8
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys conduct a focus group with unique consumer questioning, are totally unfit as trainers in a gym class, and pretend to work at a famous New York bakery.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 1
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys return to White Castle to serve up a new round of mischief, pose as bouncers at a nightclub, and offer phony horoscope readings in a mall.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S7 3
programme.desc: Sheldon explores Germany behind Mary’s back, Missy attempts to pull a fast one on George Sr. and Meemaw and Dale adjust to living together.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S7 4
programme.desc: Missy steps up, Mary has a surprise for George, and Sheldon finds his dorm occupied.

programme.title: Cobra
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone plays his toughest character yet as a police officer dirtier than Harry, who must protect a beautiful witness from a cult of serial killers.

programme.title: Friends S6 3
programme.desc: Suave Joey is as confident as usual while preparing to make love with Rachel for the first time. Ross goes to a spray-on tanning salon but fails to follow the simple directions properly.

programme.title: Friends S6 4
programme.desc: Injured Joey must get an acting part in order to qualify for health insurance. Rachel finally learns the truth about her marriage to Ross.

programme.title: Friends S6 5
programme.desc: Joey pretends to be the owner of a Porsche whose owner left his keys at Central Perk. Rachel and Ross get divorced. Chandler and Monica babysit Phoebe's triplets.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 9
programme.desc: Michael gives a confused woman the license to speed at the DMV, unclogs a "crumby" toaster at a return counter, and blows the mind of a beach attendant with a scaly encounter from under the sea!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 10
programme.desc: Michael schools a man on fish fossil breeding at a rock store and colors with his tongue at a paint store. Then, on a construction site, Michael and his helper dig up a skeleton that still has some life in it.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 11
programme.desc: Michael feeds a cannibalistic plant at a garden center, and at the tuxedo store, he sells a tie that literally suits itself. Plus, at a hockey rink, Michael's assistant is speechless with a trick so electric it melts the ice!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 12
programme.desc: Michael sweetens a woman's day at a candy store when a chocolate bunny eats her ring, and at the stadium for the Chicago White Sox, he inflates pretzels at a snack stand. Plus, one of Michael's tricks gets flushed down the tubes.

programme.title: Friends S6 6
programme.desc: The guys and the women prepare for big changes in their living arrangements. Monica and Rachel reminisce – and it's not all good memories.

programme.title: Friends S6 7
programme.desc: Chandler learns how obsessively neat Monica is when he attempts to do her a favor. Joey desperately tries not to flirt with his sexy new roommate. Phoebe's running style embarrasses Rachel.

programme.title: Wahl Street S1 1
programme.desc: As he juggles family time and his next film project, Hollywood mega-star Mark Wahlberg focuses on a new role in his expansive resume - budding business mogul.

programme.title: Wahl Street S1 2
programme.desc: Mark tackles unanticipated problems in his startups but sees a return on investment in one of his newest businesses.

programme.title: Wahl Street S1 3
programme.desc: Despite emerging prospects in many of his enterprises, Mark grapples with running both large and small businesses amid a global pandemic.

programme.title: Wahl Street S1 4
programme.desc: As the pandemic forces a global lockdown, Mark pushes through his own fears and checks in with his business partners to promote employee health and wellness.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 13
programme.desc: While working in a cheese store, Michael milks the reaction of a woman stunned by breeding brie. Later, Michael nails down the perfect app in a salon and unpacks a trick in an airport that ruffles his assistant's feathers.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 14
programme.desc: At a campsite, Michael turns rain into wine and has an app that gives new meaning to the "call of nature." Later, Michael gets thorny at a plant shop, and in a museum, he drums up ancient history that grasps for the present.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 15
programme.desc: At an appliance store, a man goes bananas over Michael's self-stocking fridge. Then, Michael speeds up the life cycle of a frog in a science lab, and he pulls the strings at an estate sale when a haunted doll toys with his assistant.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 16
programme.desc: At a deli, Michael bakes bread with power tools, and in a tux store, his outfit change doesn't suit his customer. Plus, at the stadium for the Chicago White Sox, Michael swings for the fences with a fiery trick that stuns his helper.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 3
programme.desc: Reeling from failure, Jordan begins to spiral, while Jonathan discovers newfound strength. General Lane recruits John Henry and Natalie Irons to the DOD.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 4
programme.desc: The Kents struggle to adjust to their new normal. Lois helps throw Kyle and Chrissy an impromptu wedding that doesn’t quite go as planned.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 5
programme.desc: Lois makes increasingly bold moves as she tries to stop Luthor. Jonathan struggles to balance his personal life and responsibilities, while Clark learns an unsettling truth.
